name: techgadgets-monorepo
description: Full-stack e-commerce platform for technology gadgets
author: Tech Gadgets Team <team@techgadgets.com>

scripts.test: npm test --prefix client && npm test --prefix backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix client && npm run lint --prefix backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix client && npm run lint:fix --prefix backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix client
scripts.clean: npm run clean --prefix backend && npm run clean --prefix client && rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules client/node_modules
scripts.security-audit: npm audit && npm audit --prefix backend && npm audit --prefix client
scripts.security-fix: npm audit fix && npm audit fix --prefix backend && npm audit fix --prefix client
scripts.update-deps: npm update && npm update --prefix backend && npm update --prefix client
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Installation complete! Run npm run security-audit to check for vulnerabilities.'
